review: We are having a hard time getting a movie and are constantly being pressured to buy Amazon Prime.  We just wanted Netflix for $7.99 a month.  Why are we being bombarded to have to buy or rent every movie that comes up in addition to paying a Netflix subscription?  Are we just too dumb to know how to use this?  My husband is in an assisted living facility.  I am not going to pay for Amazon Prime too.
author: Nancy K. Smith

review: For such "advancement" in their technology and buffering, you would expect the Fire stick to NOT lag. It lags on everything... Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu. I think they need to go back to the drawing board and redesign the thing to prevent the lag. Chromecast has no issues with lagging, but of course you have to "cast" the program from a device. Not so thrilled with Fire TV stick to say the least.
